unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah's injury? Hope he recovers soon for the upcoming series. Heard Pant is doing physio at NCA, that's great! Dr. Patel must be working hard. Wishing Hardik a speedy recovery too! This new stadium in Ahmedabad looks huge, almost 100,000 sq ft! Imagine the roars! Rs. 50 says India wins next match! Let's go, Team India!
